column2: STORY: One Ukrainian described how he fled from Lviv and how he had heard sirens as he arrived in the Polish town of Medyka, a border crossing with Ukraine. "At 5am some colleague called me and said war started," he said. "Russia needs to pay all economic consequences," said another Ukrainian arriving at the border. After weeks of denying plans to attack neighbouring Ukraine, Russian forces fired missiles at several cities in Ukraine and landed troops on its coast on Thursday.
column4: War has started, say Ukrainians fleeing to Poland
